snippet: The civil rights activist Zhang Liumao died suddenly this week after being held in Guangzhou since August, and his family and supporters want to know exactly how.
abstract: Family and supporters of Zhang Liumao petition Chinese government for access to civil rights activist's body and details surrounding his death in detention.
lead_paragraph: The civil rights activist Zhang Liumao died suddenly this week after being held in Guangzhou since August, and his family and supporters want to know exactly how.

headline.main: Backers of Detained Chinese Activist Demand Explanation for His Death
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Demands Follow a Death

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
